message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9,500. Can we shake on it?
Bob, you're getting close! I'm willing to consider $11,500 to close the deal today.  This is my final offer.  What do you think?
I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to go up to $10,500, but no more. Can you meet me at this price?
